game_description: Link to Main Store App: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5437449896288644/ Note: Meta Main Store version supports Quest2 only. A sport with 2.5 billion fans across the world is now in VR as iB Cricket (vSport). Step into immersive world-class stadiums with thousands cheering for you and hit the ball out of the park. Our realistic physics makes it intuitive to learn the sport within 10 mins. Till date, over 150 million balls have been played by people from 40+ countries, including both cricketing & non-cricketing nations. 98% of them said that iB Cricket is amazing! iB Cricket has also received appreciation from 100+ world-class Cricketers. - Numerous Bowling Options - Intelligent fielding based on built-in AI - Multiple Stadiums - PvP: Bowl to your friends & challenge them in a one-on-one match. - Leagues & Tournaments - Multiple Cricket Formats: 20, 50, unlimited overs - Coaching Module Hone your skills, compete in global tournaments & become a vSport star.
review_1: Will I have to buy the game again to get the official oculus store version or is there a way for this purchase to automatically transfer?
review_2: It feels like Oculus Quest is made for this game and not the other way around.
review_3: I already have ib cricket lab paid version. Let me know how I can upgrade to ib cricket store version. no help provided in discord as well
review_4: I Love it, appreciate the developer for such a amazing game.
review_5: I can't seem to access 2 player on quest one? Is this correct it's only quest 2? Please can you respond here rather than having to follow a link? Thank you
